Compatible with iOS 7, 8, 9 & 10

Backspace+ enables single character deletion when deleting text. Solving the annoyance of deleting a group of text or a whole paragraph at once accidentally.

Backspace+ comes with a custom set of text deletion speed options from snail slow to lightning fast.

Configure options from Settings.

v1.0.3
 Added 70% more custom deletion speed
 
 
v1.0.2

- Added custom deletion speed slider and removed the presets. Now you can finely tune your deletion speed to your liking.

- Added iOS 7 & 8 compatibility


v1.0.1

- iOS 9 compatibility fix
